name: Gear Slamma
description:
Gruul isn't having a good day. There's projectiles falling on top of him, weird puzzles that aren't really puzzles, and he has to listen to an 18 second loop that he can't turn off.

Despite this it's actually one of his better days. He gets to play engineer. Woooo.

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys, Escape

A game by me and Goog.
